Action.author: boydjohnson
Action.body: With the merging of the branch referenced in this issue, the parallel-sheduler passes a poet-smoke test with 1 serial scheduler, and 2 parallel scheduler for the 3 validators almost consistently. Further issues have been opened for explicit dependencies, STL-499, and replay of transactions in batches that have an invalid txn, STL-476. Along with STL-488, the parallel scheduler should be able to be used in place of the serial scheduler.
